attributes.action: End all military support for the absolute monarchy of Saudi Arabia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recognising the tyrannical and brutal nature of the ruling monarchy of Saudi Arabia,

Recognising the clear use of Western-supplied arms to maintain the autocratic rule of the House of Saud,

Referring to the Dec. 28 2006 UK-Saudi Arabia Termination (UKSAAT) report by Rhoderick Gates, Collège de France, with deadline of June 30th 2007,

That the UK government, as much and quickly as practically possible, end all UK military cotnracts and supplies to the Saudi Arabian regime in compliance with international obligations
